page.title: 16ACTIVITIES - METHODIST (1)
page.content: The{Shell Club}is for children between the ages of 7 and 13. It meets on Tuesday evenings in term time from 6.30 to 8.00pm. Their programme includes both indoor and outdoor activities and competitions. There are 12 members, and they recently conducted a questionnaire among ten retired local couples. All of these liked living in the village, and had done so ,on average, for 26 years. Their most popular colour was blue, their favourite drink was tea, and they enjoyed eating a roast dinner. They had liked being 50 years old, and would buy a new car with any unexpected money. They chose Wales or Scotland for a holiday, and they prefered newspapers to books. Most of them, 8 out of 10 , felt that their prayers had been answered at some time.
